Synopsis: Formats a script text based on the input settings or default settings.
Description: The `Invoke-Formatter` cmdlet takes a string input and formats it according to defined settings. If no Settings parameter is provided, the cmdlet assumes the default code formatting settings as defined in `Settings/CodeFormatting.psd1`.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1 - Format the input script text using the default settings
EXAMPLE 2 - Format the input script using the settings defined in a hashtable
EXAMPLE 3 - Format the input script text using the settings defined a `.psd1` file
